option.name: notice
option.value:
INFS3634 Group Assignment 2020 T1 - Team 31
This is an Android mobile application that showcases the use of functional Android building blocks and the implementation of other features such as Google Firebase and API calls. Submitted as part of a group assignment for the course, INFS3634.
Authors: Shara Bakal, Khang Bui, Laurence Truong & Brian Vu
